Description:
Unleash unparalleled performance with the Patriot P400V4 SSD, equipped with a Gen4 x4 NVMe controller for lightning-fast speeds of up to 6,200MB/s read and 5,200MB/s write. Whether you're gaming, tackling creative projects, or multitasking, the P400 V4 delivers exceptional speed and reliability tailored to your needs.

Optimized for PC and PS5 compatibility, the P400 V4 ensures top-tier performance across platforms. On the PS5, experience sequential read speeds of up to 6,000MB/s, providing smooth gameplay and quick load times.‍

Engineered for durability, its advanced graphene heat spreader efficiently manages heat for consistent peak performance. The compact M.2 2280 design supports a wide range of setups and offers generous storage.


 Built with the latest PCIe Gen4 x4 controller
· Compliant with NVMe 2.0
· Sequential Read: Up to 6,200MB/s
· Sequential Write: Up to 5,200MB/s
· PS5 SEQ Read up to 6000MB/s
· Thermal Throttling Technology
· Operating Temperature: 0~70°C
· High Efficiency Slim Graphene Heat Spreader
· TBW: 1280TB
· SmartECC™ Technology
· O/S Supported: Windows® 7*/8.0*/8.1/10/11 (*May require driver)
· 5-year warranty

Label: SSD M.2 Patriot P400 V4 1TB
